PageTitle: display bgp unnumbered peer interface verbose
FuncDef: The display bgp unnumbered peer interface verbose command displays detailed BGP unnumbered peer information. The display bgp unnumbered peer interface verbose command displays detailed BGP unnumbered peer information.
CLIs: display bgp unnumbered peer interface { <interface-name> | <IfType> <IFNum> } verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp unnumbered peer interface 100GE 1/0/8 verbose
ExtraInfo: To check detailed BGP unnumbered peer information, run the display bgp unnumbered peer interface verbose command. The command output can be used for troubleshooting.
